resetPassword.subject: Reset password
resetPassword.part1: You recently requested to reset your password for your Heyka account. Use the button below to reset it. This link to password reset is only valid for the next 24 hours.
resetPassword.part2: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email or contact support if you have questions.

welcomeLetter.subject: Welcome to Heyka
welcomeLetter.text: Welcome aboard to Heyka, verify your account and stay connected to your team always:
welcomeLetter.ps: If you have received this letter by mistake, please ignore it.

inviteToWorkspace.subject: has invited you to join in Heyka
inviteToWorkspace.body: You have received this, because {{userName}} has invited you to Heyka. This link will be valid for the next 24 hours.
inviteToWorkspace.postscriptum: If you did not request any invitation, please ignore this email.

emailVerification.subject: Email verification
emailVerification.part1: You recently requested to change email for your Heyka account. Use the button below to verify this email address.
emailVerification.part2: If you did not change email address, please ignore this email or contact support if you have questions.
